Uses of Class
simplenlg.phrasespec.AdvPhraseSpec

  • Packages that use AdvPhraseSpec 
    Package Description
    simplenlg.framework
    The framework package contains the base components required for running the SimpleNLG package.

    • Uses of AdvPhraseSpec in simplenlg.framework

      Methods in simplenlg.framework that return AdvPhraseSpec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AdvPhraseSpec NLGFactory.createAdverbPhrase()
      Creates a blank adverb phrase that has no adverb.
      AdvPhraseSpec NLGFactory.createAdverbPhrase(String adverb)
      Creates an adverb phrase wrapping the given adverb.
